definitions.definition: To utter (harsh or derogatory speech), especially at its target.
To participate in the sport of hurling.
To move rapidly with a noise; to whirl.
To convey in a wheeled vehicle.
The act by which something is hurled or thrown.
An Irish game of ancient Celtic origin. It is played with an ash stick called a hurley (cam√°n in Irish) and a hard leather ball called a sliotar.
A Cornish street game resembling rugby, played with a silver ball.
